body.warning: The REST API is alpha code. We welcome your contributions in the form of feature requests, bug reports and code.
body.p: The REST API provides a simple interface for extracting data form the SIMAL database. There are actually two different REST APIs, one provided by the catalogue generation tool and one provided by the management webapp. This document describes both of these interfaces.

ul.li: Retrieve a single projects details as a DOAP file http://domain.org:8089/projectDetails/**.rdf
Retrieve a complete list of all known contributors as a FOAF file http://domain:8089/personDetails/allMaintainers.rdf
Retrieve a complete list of projects as a JSON file. http://domain.org:8089/projectDetails/allProjects.json

section.title: Management Tool API
section.p: Whilst the catalogue tool API allows you to retrieve content from a specific catalogue implementation, the management tool API allows you to retrieve content from the core database.

ul.li: Retrieve a DOAP file for project with a given ID http://domain.org:9090/rest/doap/PROJECT_ID
